---
title: "Exasol Report"
output:
  html_document: default
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo=TRUE)

library(exa)
db <- jdbc()
```

## SQL

```{sql, connection=db}
select
	table_schema,
	count(*) as num_tables
from
	sys.exa_all_tables
group by
	1
order by
	2 desc
```

## R variables

```{r}
var <- '%IA%'
```

```{sql, connection=db, max.print = 15}
select * from sys.exa_time_zones where time_zone_name like ?var
```

## R graphics

```{sql, connection=db, output.var='out'}
select
	column_type_id,
	count(*)
from
	sys.exa_all_columns
group by
	1
```

```{r}
plot(out)
```
